secure_note.description: Label for the secure note functionality

secure_note_note.description: Label for the secure note text field

secure_note_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the secure note input field

secure_note_name.description: Placeholder text for the secure note name input field

secure_note_name_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the secure note name input field

secure_note_name_required.description: Validation message indicating that the secure note name is required

secure_note_name_max_length.message: Secure Note name must be less than 256 characters.
secure_note_name_max_length.description: Validation message indicating that the secure note title exceeds the maximum length

secure_note_text_max_length.message: Secure Note text must be less than 16384 characters.
secure_note_text_max_length.description: Validation message indicating that the secure note text exceeds the maximum length

placeholder_secure_note.description: Placeholder text for the Secure Note text input field

placeholder_secure_note_empty.description: Placeholder text when there is no Secure Note available

notification_secure_note_name_copied.description: Notification message when the secure note name is successfully copied to the clipboard

notification_secure_note_text_copied.description: Notification message when the secure note text is successfully copied to the clipboard

error_secure_note_not_found.message: Something went wrong. Secure Note not found.
error_secure_note_not_found.description: Error message displayed when the requested secure note is not found

error_secure_note_name_copy_failed.message: Failed to copy Name to clipboard.
error_secure_note_name_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the secure note name to the clipboard fails
